author: degano
body:
Updates:
- autotools: autoconf 2.68->2.69, automake 1.11.4-> 1.12.2
- xz-bootstrap: 5.1.2alpha -> 5.2.1
- xz: 5.1.2 -> 5.2.1 (in cms-externals)
- TBB: 43_20141023oss -> 43_20150316oss

Libxstl have its own toolfile and compiles against distributed version of libxml2.
title: Changes needed for slc7, update TBB and implement libxstl from cms-externals.
